scripts.docs:dev: cd frontend && npx vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: cd frontend && npx vitepress build docs
scripts.update:cert: mkdir backend/server/certs || openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout backend/server/certs/localhost.key -out backend/server/certs/localhost.crt -subj "//SKIP=skip/C=CN/ST=GD/L=Github/O=App/OU=Certs/CN=localhost/emailAddress=jinyao.ma@outlook.com"
scripts.prepare:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npx lerna bootstrap && npx lerna --scope @jinyaoma/my-playground-app exec -- vite build --emptyOutDir
scripts.prepare:backend: go mod tidy && go mod vendor && npm run update:swag && npm run update:cert
scripts.install:upx: curl -L https://github.com/upx/upx/releases/download/v3.96/upx-3.96-win64.zip > upx.zip && unzip -p upx.zip '*/upx.exe' > .tools/upx.exe && rm upx.zip
